id.message: Enter an ID for the chart building block
id.validation: An ID is required to generate the chart building block

viewOrFragmentFile.message: Select a View or Fragment file name
viewOrFragmentFile.validation: A View or Fragment is required to generate the chart building block

chart.contextPath: Enter the context path used in the page
chart.metaPath: Enter the relative path of the property in the meta model
chart.filterBar: Enter the ID of the filter bar building block associated with the chart
chart.bindingContextType: Select a Binding Context Path Type
chart.selectionChange: Enter a function to be called when the selection has changed

id.message: Enter an ID for the filter bar building block
id.validation: An ID is required to generate the filter bar building block

viewOrFragmentFile.validation: A View or Fragment is required to generate the filterbar building block

filterBar.metaPath: Enter the relative path of the property in the meta model
filterBar.filterChanged: Enter a function to be called when the filter value has changed
filterBar.search: Enter a function to be called when the go button is pressed

table.tableBuildingBlockPropertiesDescription:
Select the `View or Fragment File` where you would like to insert the table building block and provide a `Building Block ID` to identify the table. 
 Select an `Entity Type`, an optional `Navigation Path`, and a `Line Item Qualifier` you would like to use for the table building block. 
 Select an `Aggregation Path` to determine where you would like the table to be placed on the page. 
 If you would like to link the table to an existing filter bar, provide the `Associated Filter Bar ID`.
table.tableVisualizationPropertiesDescription: Configure your table using the properties below.

viewOrFragmentFile.message: Select a View or Fragment file name
viewOrFragmentFile.validation: A View or Fragment is required to generate the table building block

id.message: Enter an ID for the table building block
id.validation: An ID is required to generate the filter bar building block

table.bindingContextType: Select the Binding Context Path Type
table.filterBar: Enter the ID of the filter bar building block associated with the table
